comments.en:
Multifunction device: print/copy/scan/fax.

High-end variation of the OfficeJet G55 theme, with automatic document feeder (ADF), fax capability, print duplexer, and JetDirect 170X print server; see that entry for scanning and other driver information. Use the "hpijs", "cdj970" or "pcl3" driver for duplex support, the "hpijs" from HP gives the best output quality.

For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status, maintenance features, scanning and photo card unload use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).
